holdings.name: The Symbol of Love and Unity

stats.title: Hold 3 NFT - Unique
stats.name: 3 NFT
stats.condition: (value['A Letter from the Universe'] >= 1 && value['The Reflection of Love'] >= 1 && value['The Symbol of Love and Unity'] >= 1)

stats.name: 1 NFT
